name: @InoReader: Colorful Feeds
description: Applies pseudo-not-really-random background colors to feed items in Inoreader RSS reader. The 'randomness' is simply based on the last digit of the subscription id.
additional_info: versions: 1.00: release (2013-07-02). 1.01: adjusted background-colors; adjusted .article_header_text padding; override a couple of conflicting styles implemented by userstyle:87923 (@InoReader: tweaks & fixups) (2013-07-02). 1.02: numerous changes to selectors; broad changes to rules related to article padding/alignment to make it more similar to site style.
